MELHAM CONSTRUCTION CORPORATION (MCC), first registered on February 2020 in the Philippine government situated at no.27 commonwealth avenue Diliman north Fairview Quezon City.
MELHAM CONSTRUCTION CORPORATION (MCC), first registered on February 2020 in the Philippine government situated at no.27 commonwealth avenue Diliman north Fairview Quezon City.
Melham Construction Company exists to meet the country’s growing demand for industrialization through diverse specializations, ensuring that each task is handled professionally.

This is achieved with the best construction techniques at economical prices to establish client satisfaction and trust. we handle operations with care, resulting in guaranteed high-quality results that meet the clients’ needs.

To become one of the country’s caterers of the growing demand of industrialization that brings innovation to the people, all the while having affordable prices with guaranteed quality and efficient service.
Gathering all the necessary information and carefully planning the design to meet client’s prerequisites.
Integrating designs and carrying out the job with quality and efficiency.
Handling operations with diligence producing a quality building that satisfies client’s needs.

Tell us about your project ideas or simply introduce yourself. We are here to help you develop ideal structures, whether you have a great concept or need some inspiration with a construction project. Allow us to inspire you from conception to completion.
FIND US HERE BY CLICKING THE MAP
We diversified and widen our specialization to fulfill customer’s need. Each department excels and further develop techniques to create a topnotch approach for incoming projects.
Using the principle of force, energy, motion - engineers ensure that the end products function safely and efficiently.
Mainly develop test and manages the electrical equipments preventing any electrical accidents.
Ensuring the structures are sturdy and stable by careful planning and supervising.
Specialized in handling , controlling, fixings water-related things which is useful in modern structures.
Department handles the preventive measures for fire and ensures structures are fire-safe.
Positioning security cameras to ensure safety in your home or workplace.
Designs and develops building interiors to optimize structure capacity.
Designs and improves house or workplace aesthetics without sacrificing its durability and stability.
WE ACCEPT INTERNS FROM BOTH COLLEGE AND SENIOR HIGH SCHOOL
To apply, you need the following:
A 42-meter high tower situated in Purok 3, Brgy. San Juan, Botolan, Zambales project in partnership with the DITO Telecommunity Corporation.
A 42-meter high tower situated in Eliaed St. Poblacion North, Sta. Cruz, Zambales project in partnership with the DITO Telecommunity Corporation.
